original_text: That ye may suck, and be satisfied with the breasts of her consolations; that ye may milk out, and be delighted with the abundance of her glory.
korean_text: 너희가 젖을 빠는 것 같이 그 위로하는 품에서 만족하겠고 젖을 넉넉히 빤 것 같이 그 영광의 풍성함으로 말미암아 즐거워하리라

sentences.original_text: and be satisfied with the breasts of her consolations
and be delighted with the abundance of her glory
